title: Canton Chronicles:Rising Power
description: In a hidden land, protected by three all-powerful spiritual, a lost ship is stranded. Its passengers are accepted as the island's residents, being granted superpowers by the three spirits. After a long period of progress and a devastating war, peace rules over the land for over eighty years. Now, as a new threat arises, a band of troubled friends are granted new Powers, destined to become Heroes.
author: Faidra-Foteini Petaniti
